be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.models.handlers

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.models.handlers.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.util.Observable
    Handles the application and keeps all user data up to date.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Application()
      Initialises the application.

      • updateInvitationRead

        public void updateInvitationRead(Project project,
                                 User collaborator)
                          throws DatabaseException,
                                 ConnectionFailedException
        Updates the InvitationRead column in the database to 1. It means that the sender of invitation has read the window with all the invitations that he sent to his collaboration.
        Parameters:
        project - the project which is the ProjectID column.
        collaborator - the collaborator which is the UserId column
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • updateProject

        public void updateProject(Project projectToModify,
                          java.lang.String projectTitle,
                          java.lang.String projectDescription,
                          long endDate,
                          Color color)
                   throws DatabaseException,
                          ConnectionFailedException
        Calls the function in ProjectDatabase that updates the parent/sub project and also calls the function that updates the project in the list of projects.
        Parameters:
        projectToModify - the project to modify
        projectTitle - the new title of the project
        projectDescription - the new description of the project
        endDate - the new end date
        color - the new color
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if a problem occurs while updating the parent/sub project in the ProjectDatabase
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

                      throws DatabaseException,
                             ConnectionFailedException

        project - the project
        newDescription - the task description
        startDateHour - the task start date
        endDateHour - the task end date
        Throws:

      • updateTaskInProject

        public void updateTaskInProject(Project project,
                                Task taskToEdit,
                                java.lang.String newDescription,
                                java.lang.Long startDateHour,
                                java.lang.Long endDateHour)
                         throws DatabaseException,
                                ConnectionFailedException
        Updates the task of a project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project in which the task is updated
        taskToEdit - the task that is being updated
        newDescription - the new description of the task
        startDateHour - the start date and hour of the task in epoch milli format
        endDateHour - the end date and hour of the task in epoch milli format
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if an error occurs during the updating of the task
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
